0110000000011000 0010001101111001 0 -> sum: 1000001110010001, cout: 0
1010110110010001 0100001110010100 0 -> sum: 1111000100100101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
